Metadata.Title: CVE-2025-15468 affecting package openssl for versions less than 3.3.5-2
Metadata.Description: CVE-2025-15468 affecting package openssl for versions less than 3.3.5-2. A patched version of the package is available.

Criterion.Comment: Package openssl is earlier than 3.3.5-2, affected by CVE-2025-15468
